item.title: Contact Info
item.description: The best way to reach us would be by email. Data Science Institute: datascience@columbia.edu Mail: Data Science Institute, 1401 Northwest Corner, Mail Code 4720, 550 West 120th Street, New York, NY 10027 Fax: 212-854-1599 Phone: 212-854-5660 The DSI scholars program: dsi-scholars@columbia.edu
